titleStmt.title: The life and death of Mr. Edmund Geninges priest, crowned with martyrdome at London, the 10. day of Nouember, in the yeare M.D.XCI.
titleStmt.author: Geninges, John, d. 1660.
Baes, Martin, engraver.
Wilson, John, ca. 1575-ca. 1645?, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Author identified on A3r: "I.G.P.", i.e. John Geninges priest. Sometimes also attributed to John Wilson.
The title page is engraved and signed: Mart. bas f. Duaci.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
